'''Pale Mist''' is an exploration mechanic in [[Natlan]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Hit the stone statue to move it; the purified space will move with the statue.
* The statues move along set paths marked by paint lines on the ground. 
* Statues can move both forwards and backwards.
